snippet: Old Sound Room, a company built by recent Yale School of Drama grads, has adapted spooky yarns plucked from Neil Gaiman’s “Fragile Things.”
abstract: Alexis Soloski reviews Old Sound Room production of October in the Chair and Other Fragile Things, adapted from stories by Neil Gaiman at American Theater of Actors; Michael McQuilken directs.
lead_paragraph: Old Sound Room, a company built by recent Yale School of Drama grads, has adapted spooky yarns plucked from Neil Gaiman’s “Fragile Things.”

headline.main: From Month to Month, in a Work of the Eerie and the Oddball
